casebody.data:
SUSAN M. SPECHT ET AL., PETITIONERS, v. THE CITY OF EAST ORANGE ET AL., DEFENDANTS. Decided November 13, 1930.

Before Justices Trenchard, Lloyd and Case. ‘

For the petitioners, Grosso, Brundage & Anderson. Per Curiam.

This matter was heard and disposed of at the January-term, 1930.

Attorneys for the petitioners have presented an application stating various reasons why a reargument of the cause should .be granted. The reasons are not, in our opinion, adequate, and the application is denied.
